abstract: Library of Congress acquires 96 courtroom drawings as part of Thomas V Girardi collection; three illustrators featured in collection, Aggie Kenny, Bill Robles and Elizabeth Williams, have chronicled famous trials over last 50 years.

headline.print_headline: Library of Congress Adds 96 Courtroom Drawings Illustrating Life and Law
headline.main: Library of Congress Acquires Drawings of Courtroom Drama

snippet: The sketches bring to life trials as varied as that of Charles Manson in the 1970s to those of recent terrorism suspects.
lead_paragraph: The sketches bring to life trials as varied as that of Charles Manson in the 1970s to those of recent terrorism suspects.
